properties.name: Cotopaxi
properties.description: One of world's highest active volcanoes with near-perfect cone shape

properties.name: Quilotoa Crater Lake
properties.description: Emerald-green volcanic crater lake at 3,900 meters elevation

properties.name: Yasuni National Park
properties.description: UNESCO Biosphere with highest biodiversity per hectare on Earth

properties.name: Cajas National Park
properties.description: Continental divide landscape with over 700 lakes in Andean paramo

properties.name: Middle of the World Monument
properties.description: Equatorial line marker (though GPS shows the actual equator is nearby)

properties.name: Quito Historic Center
properties.description: First UNESCO World Heritage city with best-preserved colonial architecture

properties.name: Cuenca
properties.description: UNESCO colonial city with four rivers and Panama hat craftsmanship

properties.name: Banos de Agua Santa
properties.description: Adventure capital with hot springs, waterfalls, and volcano views
